text: The Republic of Vietnam competed as Vietnam at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany. Two competitors took part in one event in one sport. ==Shooting== Two shooters represented Vietnam in 1972. ;50 m pistol * Hồ Minh Thu * Hương Hoàng Thi ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1972 Summer Olympics 1972 Category:1972 in Vietnam
title: Vietnam at the 1972 Summer Olympics
